description:
go.tools/ssa: drop ssa.Id in favour of types.Id function.
Also exploit fact that Recv() is now always non-nil, even for interfaces.

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a5a60e59aee8&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa: drop ssa.Id in favour of types.Id function.
Also exploit fact that Recv() is now always non-nil, even for interfaces.

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11613043

subject: code review 11613043: go.tools/ssa: drop ssa.Id in favour of types.Id function.
